meaning_str.bing:
n. 工具；【机】刀具；工具母机；【出】压印机
v. 用工具加工；【出】压印；〈英口〉开车；乘车
网络. 工具菜单；工具栏；工具箱

工具；【机】刀具；工具母机；【出】压印机
用工具加工；【出】压印；〈英口〉开车；乘车
工具菜单；工具栏；工具箱

用工具给...加工；压印；驾车到处跑；（tool的第三人称单数）
使用工具；（tool的第三人称单数）

1.en: They are "rapidly deploying very easy to use tools for cutting edge exploits, " Smith said at a Black Hat presentation last week.
1.cn: 他们快速部署非常易用的工具，用于尖端应用。史密斯在上周黑帽会议的一个介绍会上说。

2.en: I'm simply going to quote 37 Signals on this: "Everyone loves simple tools that help get the job done and then get out of your way. "
2.cn: 关于这一点我想简单地引用一下37Signals：“每个人都喜欢能帮助完成工作的简单工具，而且这种工具召之即来挥之即去。”

3.en: She said: "We are exploring, we are stumbling, we are trying to identify what will be the right tools [and] legal principles. "
3.cn: 她说：“我们正在探索，我们会遇到绊脚石，我们正试图确定哪些是正确的工具[和]法律原则。”

0.en: How? I don't know. Maybe they have tools.
0.cn: 怎么会呢？我不知道，或许它们有工具。

1.en: Where are your tools? Right here. All right, team, open up your practice kits.
1.cn: 你的工具呢？就在这里，好了，队员们，打开练习工具箱。

2.en: And the problem with Washington is that we haven't given you the tools to build it.
2.cn: 华盛顿的问题在于没有给你们打造生活的工具。

3.en: You highlight the word you want to change, go under tools and the thesaurus generates gives.
3.cn: 选中想改的词，在工具条找到"词典"激活

4.en: I'm not saying people can't use tools. Even an otter picks up a rock when he wants a clam.
4.cn: 我又没说人们不能使用工具，连水獭想吃蛤蜊时都知道用石头敲开了。

5.en: And the price of the fundraising would be to lose all control, and to become the tools of a faceless committee in York.
5.cn: 而集资的代价是彻底失去控制权，成为约克不知名的委员会的工具。

6.en: First, Daddy Pig quickly washes Peppa and George. Then peppa vacuums the floor. And Daddy Pig tidies up the tools.
6.cn: 首先，猪爸爸把佩奇和乔治洗干净。佩奇用吸尘器整理好地板。爸爸整理好工具。

7.en: First, Daddy Pig quickly washes Peppa and George. Then peppa vacuums the floor. And Daddy Pig tidies up the tools.
7.cn: 首先，猪爸爸把佩琪和乔治洗干净。佩琪用吸尘器整理好地板。爸爸整理好工具。

8.en: So I used some of your hacking tools to break into their servers. We found this in one of Caroline's deleted e-mail threads.
8.cn: 所以我用了你的黑客工具侵入了他们的服务器，在卡罗琳的已删除的电邮里发现的。

9.en: All right, the purpose of this drill is to acclimate us to the use of tools in extreme temperatures such as we will face in the Arctic Circle.
9.cn: 好了，这次的训练目的是使我们适应在即将面对的北极圈内极度寒冷的温度下使用各种工具。

10.en: Well, that is how it feels. Hey, can you pass me that drill? Yeah, fun fact about Amish barn raising--they don't use any power tools.
10.cn: 听你说话的确是这感受呢。能把电钻递给我吗？分享一个阿米什人团建谷仓有趣知识——他们不使用任何电动工具。

11.en: That a pile of tools, a bucket, a knife, a pencil, might become my greatest treasures, or that knowing Richard Parker was here might ever bring me peace.
11.cn: 没想到一袋工具，一个空桶，一把小刀，一支铅笔会是我最丰厚的宝藏，没想到理查德·帕克的陪伴竟会让我感到安心。

12.en: But one day, if we can develop the tools to accelerate ourselves to similar speeds, then we may regularly send time travelers into the future, bringing with them tales of a long, forgotten past.
12.cn: 但是终有一天，如果我们能够发明一些工具可以让我们加速到如光速度般，到那时候，我们可能随时可以把穿越时空者送到遥远的未来，还有带着我们 古老，被遗忘的故事去。

13.en: My first escape, landed on dental tools. I was aiming for the toilet. Toilet? All drains lead to the ocean, kid.
13.cn: 我第一次逃跑结果掉到了牙钻上，我本来想跳到马桶的。马桶? 条条水管通大海，孩子。

14.en: Their tools were climbing hook and shadow. These demons were trained by the Old Man in the Mountain. They were Hashshashin.
14.cn: 他们借助的是飞爪和阴影，这些恶魔是深山中的长者一手训练出来的，他们是哈沙辛人。

15.en: And in doing so, your class will be armed with more tools of influence and empowerment than any other generation in history.
15.cn: 届时，各位同学在影响力以及自主力方面都会如虎添翼，胜于以往的任何一代人。

16.en: They're one of the two companies that makes these massive whole genome sequencing tools. And so what he did was he got his kids sequenced.
16.cn: 这家公司是提供基因组测序设备的两大供应商之一，所以他测定他的孩子的基因。

17.en: Hang on, I know I don't possess the tools of leadership, but I don't understand why we can't assemble the equipment inside the hut and then take it outside.
17.cn: 等一下，我知道我不具备领导潜质，但我不理解为什么不能在考察站装配好器材然后再拿出去呢。

18.en: For a moment, if we could just disregard the governments and what the media's saying, just for the sake of the argument with our own tools of critical thinking.
18.cn: 如果我们可能暂时不考虑政府或者媒体说什么，我们将心比心，用我们自己的批判性思维。
